trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />를 사용한 serialization 구성에 사용되는 XML 요소를 처리합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) group, which contains the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 처리 하는 데 사용 된 [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) 포함 된 그룹은 [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) 요소를 특히 알려진 형식 컬렉션에 형식 추가할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contract known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 데이터 계약 알려진 형식에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [데이터 계약 알려진 형식을](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the element to add to the known types collection, see [<declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).
trans-unit.target: 요소를 사용 하 여 알려진된 형식 컬렉션에 추가 하는 예제를 보려면 [ <declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: 알려진 형식 컬렉션을 설정하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used for the serialization configuration section.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that represents the configuration to retrieve.
Gets the serialization configuration section for the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 구성의 serialization 구성 섹션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> that represents the configuration section.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: 알려진 형식 컬렉션을 설정하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" />을 가져옵니다.
